bilingual.source: Excessive consumption can lead to financial problems.
bilingual.target: 过度消费会导致财务问题。
他们的消费水平反映了他们的收入。

bilingual.source: The consumption level in tourism is rising year by year.
bilingual.target: 旅游业的消费水平逐年上升。

bilingual.source: We calculated the consumption per person for this trip.
bilingual.target: 我们计算了这次旅行的人均消费。

bilingual.source: Excessive consumption can have negative effects on health.
bilingual.target: 过度消费会对健康产生负面影响。

bilingual.source: The community promotes temperance to reduce alcohol consumption.
bilingual.target: 社区提倡节制以减少酒精消费。

bilingual.source: The government is taking measures to curb excessive consumption.
bilingual.target: 政府正在采取措施遏制过度消费。

bilingual.source: They provided a detailed report on the consumption per person.
bilingual.target: 他们提供了一个人均消费的详细报告。

yingyinNormal.en: So, while this would stimulate business, it would also encourage over consumption, or hoarding commodities, like food and fuel, raising their prices and leading to consumer shortages and even more inflation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这虽然能刺激商业活动，但也会造成过度消费或大量囤货，例如食物和燃料，使得价格攀升，导致供不应求，通膨更加恶化。

yingyinNormal.en: So, while this would stimulate business, it would also encourage over consumption, or hoarding commodities, like food and fuel, raising their prices and leading to consumer shortages and even more inflation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这虽然能刺激商业活动，但也会造成过度消费或大量囤货，例如食物和燃料，使得价格攀升，导致供不应求，通膨更加恶化。

yingyinNormal.en: Life is an act of consumption, Jupiter. To live is to consume.
yingyinNormal.zh: 生命本身就是一件消耗品，朱庇特。人们活着就是在消耗。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course not. Why learn self-reliance when the industrial machine depends on constant consumption?
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然不行。为何要学习自力更生？工业机器就仰仗不断的消耗不是吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: To become much more self-sufficient, the UK would need to drastically reduce its <highlight>consumption</highlight> of animal foods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了更加自给自足，英国需要大幅减少动物性食品的消费。

examination_example.sentence: Stemming climate change, for example, is as much about changing <highlight>consumption</highlight> patterns and promoting tax acceptance as it is about developing clean energy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，遏制气候变化既关乎改变消费模式和提高税收接受度，也关乎发展清洁能源。

examination_example.sentence: First, most people do not realise that there are strong commercial agendas at work to keep them in passive <highlight>consumption</highlight> mode.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，大多数人没有意识到有强大的商业议程在起作用，使他们处于被动消费模式。

the using up of a resource
an amount of something which is used up or ingested
the reception of information or entertainment by a mass audience

word_usage.usage: consumption为不可数名词，也可用于其他名词之前，修饰限定该名词，如：consumption patterns 消费模式。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the using up of a resource

examination_example.sentence: A few countries are benefiting enormously from the <highlight>consumption</highlight> of fossil fuels, while contributing disproportionately to the global burden of climate change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些国家依靠消耗化石燃料给自己牟取暴利的时候，同时极大地加重了全球气候变化的负担。

sense_info_list.en: an amount of something which is used up or ingested
the purchase and use of goods and services by the public

examination_example.sentence: Because of these differences, comparing France's <highlight>consumption</highlight> with the U.S.'s overstates the gap in economic welfare.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于这些差异，比较法国和美国的消费夸大了经济福利的差距。

examination_example.sentence: Taking into account not only growth in <highlight>consumption</highlight> per person but also changes in working time, life expectancy, and inequality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑了人均消费的增长，还考虑了工作时间，预期寿命和经济不平等等方面的变化。

sense_info_list.en: the eating, drinking, or ingesting of something

examination_example.sentence: Well, in this excerpt from your book, you argue that meat <highlight>consumption</highlight> and private transport are devastating the environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 嗯，在你书中的这段摘录中，你认为肉类消费和私人交通正在破坏环境。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

n. 消费者；用户；顾客；使用者；消耗者；食用者；取食者

word_family.mean: v. 吃；喝；摄取；吸引；购买；消费；用完；耗尽；消耗；毁灭

sense_info_list.en: the purchase and use of goods and services by the public

examination_example.sentence: And in the UK, dairy <highlight>consumption</highlight> overall has fallen by a third in the past 20 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在英国，乳制品消费总量在过去20年中下降了三分之一。

examination_example.sentence: As incomes rise among low-income consumers, the potential for further grain <highlight>consumption</highlight> is huge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着低收入消费者收入的增加，粮食消费潜力巨大。

sense_info_list.en: an amount of something which is used up or ingested

examination_example.sentence: Calorie <highlight>consumption</highlight> had fallen drastically over the decades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在过去的几十年里，卡路里摄入量急剧下降。

examination_example.sentence: Calorie <highlight>consumption</highlight> is linked to the amount of snacks one eats.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 热量的摄入与一个人吃零食的量有关。

examination_example.sentence: The national statistics did not reflect the actual calorie <highlight>consumption</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国家统计数据没有反映实际的卡路里摄入量。

sense_info_list.en: the eating; drinking; or ingesting of something

examination_example.sentence: What often goes unnoticed in surveys on food <highlight>consumption</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在食品摄入调查中，什么经常被忽视?

examination_example.sentence: High-protein breakfasts have been found particularly effective in reducing the longing for food and <highlight>consumption</highlight> later in the day, according to research by the Australian Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 澳大利亚的联邦科学与工业研究组织的研究发现，蛋白质含量丰富的早餐，对于降低当天随后时间的食欲及减少食物摄取量，特别有效。

sense_info_list.en: the using up of a resource
the reception of information or entertainment by a mass audience

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
